mapper.select: SELECT sfrp.PARTY_FULL_NAME AS partyFullName, sfrp.RELATIONSHIP AS relationship FROM SYS_FUND_RELATED_PARTY sfrp WHERE 1 = 1 AND sfrp.FUND_ID = #{fundId} AND sfrp.ACTIVE = 'Y'

SELECT IRP.RP_NAME AS rpName, IRP.RP_NAME_ABBR AS rpNameAbbr, IRP.RELATIONSHIP AS relationship FROM wp_i_rp IRP WHERE 1 = 1 AND IRP.STATUS = 'Y' AND IRP.FUND_ID = #{fundId} AND IRP.PERIOD = #{period} ORDER BY IRP.SORT

SELECT IT.PARTY_SHORT_NAME AS partyShortName, IF(IT.AMOUNT_CURRENT = 0, null, IT.AMOUNT_CURRENT) AS amountCurrent, IF(IT.RATE_CURRENT = 0, null, IT.RATE_CURRENT) AS rateCurrent, IF(IT.AMOUNT_LAST = 0, null, IT.AMOUNT_LAST) AS amountLast, IF(IT.RATE_LAST = 0, null, IT.RATE_LAST) AS rateLast FROM wp_i_transaction IT WHERE 1 = 1 AND IT.STATUS = 'Y' AND IT.FUND_ID = #{fundId} AND IT.PERIOD = #{period} AND IT.TYPE = #{type} ORDER BY IT.SORT

SELECT N500R.RELEATED_PARTY AS relatedParty, IF(N500R.COMMISSION = 0, null, N500R.COMMISSION) AS commission, IF(N500R.PROPORTION_TOTAL = 0, null, N500R.PROPORTION_TOTAL) AS proportionTotal, IF(N500R.END_BALANCE = 0, null, N500R.END_BALANCE) AS endBalance, IF(N500R.PROPORTION_BALANCE = 0, null, N500R.PROPORTION_BALANCE) AS proportionBalance FROM wp_n500_related N500R WHERE 1 = 1 AND N500R.STATUS = 'Y' AND N500R.FUND_ID = #{fundId} AND N500R.PERIOD = #{period}

SELECT IMF.TPYE AS tpye, IMF.ITEM AS item, IF(IMF.AMOUNT_CURRENT = 0, null, IMF.AMOUNT_CURRENT) AS amountCurrent, IF(IMF.AMOUNT_LAST = 0, null, IMF.AMOUNT_LAST) AS amountLast FROM wp_i_mge_fee IMF WHERE 1 = 1 AND IMF.STATUS = 'Y' AND IMF.FUND_ID = #{fundId} AND IMF.PERIOD = #{period} ORDER BY IMF.SORT

SELECT ISF.`LEVEL` AS `level`, ISF.PARTY_SHORT_NAME AS partyShortName, IF(ISF.SALES_COMMISION_AMT = 0, null, ISF.SALES_COMMISION_AMT) AS salesCommisionAmt, IF(ISF.SALES_COMMISION_BAL = 0, null, ISF.SALES_COMMISION_BAL) AS salesCommisionBal, IF(ISF.SALES_COMMISION_AMT_LAST = 0, null, ISF.SALES_COMMISION_AMT_LAST) AS salesCommisionAmtLast, IF(ISF.SALES_COMMISION_BAL_LAST = 0, null, ISF.SALES_COMMISION_BAL_LAST) AS salesCommisionBalLast FROM wp_i_sales_fee ISF WHERE 1 = 1 AND ISF.STATUS = 'Y' AND ISF.FUND_ID = #{fundId} AND ISF.PERIOD = #{period} ORDER BY ISF.SORT

SELECT ISF.`LEVEL` AS `level`, IF(SUM(ISF.SALES_COMMISION_AMT) = 0, null, SUM(ISF.SALES_COMMISION_AMT)) AS salesCommisionAmt, IF(SUM(ISF.SALES_COMMISION_BAL) = 0, null, SUM(ISF.SALES_COMMISION_BAL)) AS salesCommisionBal, IF(SUM(ISF.SALES_COMMISION_AMT_LAST) = 0, null, SUM(ISF.SALES_COMMISION_AMT_LAST)) AS salesCommisionAmtLast, IF(SUM(ISF.SALES_COMMISION_BAL_LAST) = 0, null, SUM(ISF.SALES_COMMISION_BAL_LAST)) AS salesCommisionBalLast FROM wp_i_sales_fee ISF WHERE 1 = 1 AND ISF.STATUS = 'Y' AND ISF.FUND_ID = #{fundId} AND ISF.PERIOD = #{period}

SELECT IBT.PARTY_SHORT_NAME AS partyShortName, IF(IBT.BUY_BOND_AMT_RP = 0, null, IBT.BUY_BOND_AMT_RP) AS buyBondAmtRp, IF(IBT.SELL_BOND_AMT_RP = 0, null, IBT.SELL_BOND_AMT_RP) AS sellBondAmtRp, IF(IBT.ANTI_REPO_AMT_RP = 0, null, IBT.ANTI_REPO_AMT_RP) AS antiRepoAmtRp, IF(IBT.ANTI_REPO_INT_RP = 0, null, IBT.ANTI_REPO_INT_RP) AS antiRepoIntRp, IF(IBT.SELL_REPO_AMT_RP = 0, null, IBT.SELL_REPO_AMT_RP) AS sellRepoAmtRp, IF(IBT.SELL_REPO_INT_RP = 0, null, IBT.SELL_REPO_INT_RP) AS sellRepoIntRp, IF(IBT.BUY_BOND_AMT_LAST = 0, null, IBT.BUY_BOND_AMT_LAST) AS buyBondAmtLast, IF(IBT.SELL_BOND_AMT_LAST = 0, null, IBT.SELL_BOND_AMT_LAST) AS sellBondAmtLast, IF(IBT.ANTI_REPO_AMT_LAST = 0, null, IBT.ANTI_REPO_AMT_LAST) AS antiRepoAmtLast, IF(IBT.ANTI_REPO_INT_LAST = 0, null, IBT.ANTI_REPO_INT_LAST) AS antiRepoIntLast, IF(IBT.SELL_REPO_AMT_LAST = 0, null, IBT.SELL_REPO_AMT_LAST) AS sellRepoAmtLast, IF(IBT.SELL_REPO_INT_LAST = 0, null, IBT.SELL_REPO_INT_LAST) AS sellRepoIntLast FROM wp_i_bank_thx IBT WHERE 1 = 1 AND IBT.STATUS = 'Y' AND IBT.FUND_ID = #{fundId} AND IBT.PERIOD = #{period} ORDER BY IBT.SORT

SELECT IMHF.`LEVEL` AS `level`, IMHF.SORT AS sort, IMHF.ITEM AS item, IF(IMHF.AMOUNT = 0, null, IMHF.AMOUNT) AS amount, IF(IMHF.AMOUNT_LAST = 0, null, IMHF.AMOUNT_LAST) AS amountLast FROM wp_i_mger_hold_fund IMHF WHERE 1 = 1 AND IMHF.STATUS = 'Y' AND IMHF.FUND_ID = #{fundId} AND IMHF.PERIOD = #{period} ORDER BY IMHF.SORT

SELECT IUHF.`LEVEL` AS `level`, IUHF.PARTY_SHORT_NAME AS partyShortName, IF(IUHF.`SHARE` = 0, null, IUHF.`SHARE`) AS `share`, IF(IUHF.RATE = 0, null, IUHF.RATE) AS rate, IF(IUHF.SHARE_LAST = 0, null, IUHF.SHARE_LAST) AS shareLast, IF(IUHF.RATE_LAST = 0, null, IUHF.RATE_LAST) AS rateLast FROM wp_i_unmger_hold_fund IUHF WHERE 1 = 1 AND IUHF.STATUS = 'Y' AND IUHF.FUND_ID = #{fundId} AND IUHF.PERIOD = #{period} ORDER BY IUHF.SORT

SELECT IB.PARTY_SHORT_NAME AS partyShortName, IB.BANK_BAL_CURRENT AS bankBalCurrent, IB.INTEREST_INCOME_CURRENT AS interestIncomeCurrent, IB.BANK_BAL_LAST AS bankBalLast, IB.INTEREST_INCOME_LAST AS interestIncomeLast FROM wp_i_bank IB WHERE 1 = 1 AND IB.STATUS = 'Y' AND IB.FUND_ID = #{fundId} AND IB.PERIOD = #{period}

SELECT IU.PARTY_SHORT_NAME AS partyShortName, IU.STOCK_CODE AS stockCode, IU.STOCK_NAME AS stockName, IU.DISTIBUTION AS distibution, IU.QUANTITY AS quantity, IU.AMOUNT AS amount FROM wp_i_underwrite IU WHERE 1 = 1 AND IU.STATUS = 'Y' AND IU.FUND_ID = #{fundId} AND IU.PERIOD = #{period}
